    • Method Detail

      • CanDiscardCards

        boolean CanDiscardCards()
        This method is called whenever a player tries to discard
        Returns:
        True if player can discard cards: False otherwise

      • CanRollNumber

        boolean CanRollNumber(int n)
        This method is called each time the dice is rolled
        Parameters:
        n - the number
        Returns:
        True if the number is between 2 and 12: False otherwise

      • CanBuildRoad

        boolean CanBuildRoad()
        This method is called when a player tries to build a road
        Returns:
        True if the Player has the resources to build a Road

      • CanBuildSettlement

        boolean CanBuildSettlement()
        This method is called when a player tries to build a settlement
        Returns:
        True if the Player has the resources to build a Settlement

      • CanBuildCity

        boolean CanBuildCity()
        This method is called when a player tries to build a city
        Returns:
        True if the Player has the resources to build a City

      • CanOfferTrade

        boolean CanOfferTrade(Player player)
        This method is called when a player attempts to offer a trade
        Parameters:
        player - the Player offering a trade
        Returns:
        True if the turn belongs to the Player: False otherwise

      • CanMaritimeTrade

        boolean CanMaritimeTrade()
        This method is called when a player attempts to perform a Maritime Trade
        Parameters:
        player - the Player offering a trade
        Returns:
        True if the turn belongs to the Player: False otherwise

      • CanFinishTurn

        boolean CanFinishTurn()
        This method is called when the player tries to finish his/her turn
        Returns:
        True if the player can finish his/her turn: False otherwise

      • CanBuyDevCard

        boolean CanBuyDevCard()
        This method is called when a player tries to buy a development card
        Returns:
        True if the player has sufficient resources to buy a development card: False otherwise

      • CanUseYearOfPlenty

        boolean CanUseYearOfPlenty()
        This method is called when a player tries to play a development card
        Returns:
        True if it is the players turn and if the player has owned the card for at least 1 turn: False otherwise

      • CanUseRoadBuilder

        boolean CanUseRoadBuilder()
        This method is called when a player tries to play a development card
        Returns:
        True if it is the players turn and if the player has owned the card for at least 1 turn: False otherwise

      • CanUseSoldier

        boolean CanUseSoldier()
        This method is called when a player tries to play a development card
        Returns:
        True if it is the players turn and if the player has owned the card for at least 1 turn: False otherwise

      • CanUseMonopoly

        boolean CanUseMonopoly()
        This method is called when a player tries to play a development card
        Returns:
        True if it is the players turn and if the player has owned the card for at least 1 turn: False otherwise

      • CanUseMonument

        boolean CanUseMonument()
        This method is called when a player tries to play a development card
        Returns:
        True if it is the players turn AND if the player has owned the card for at least 1 turn OR if it is the players turn AND the points gained from the Monument will bring the player to 10 victory points: False otherwise

      • canPlaceRoad

        boolean canPlaceRoad(EdgeLocation edgeLoc)
        This method is called whenever the user is trying to place a road on the map. It is called by the view for each "mouse move" event. The returned value tells the view whether or not to allow the road to be placed at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        edgeLoc - The proposed road location
        Returns:
        true if the road can be placed at edgeLoc, false otherwise

      • canPlaceSettlement

        boolean canPlaceSettlement(VertexLocation vertLoc)
        This method is called whenever the user is trying to place a settlement on the map. It is called by the view for each "mouse move" event. The returned value tells the view whether or not to allow the settlement to be placed at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - The proposed settlement location
        Returns:
        true if the settlement can be placed at vertLoc, false otherwise

      • canPlaceCity

        boolean canPlaceCity(VertexLocation vertLoc)
        This method is called whenever the user is trying to place a city on the map. It is called by the view for each "mouse move" event. The returned value tells the view whether or not to allow the city to be placed at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - The proposed city location
        Returns:
        true if the city can be placed at vertLoc, false otherwise

      • canPlaceRobber

        boolean canPlaceRobber(HexLocation hexLoc)
        This method is called whenever the user is trying to place the robber on the map. It is called by the view for each "mouse move" event. The returned value tells the view whether or not to allow the robber to be placed at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        hexLoc - The proposed robber location
        Returns:
        true if the robber can be placed at hexLoc, false otherwise

      • placeRoad

        void placeRoad(EdgeLocation edgeLoc)
        This method is called when the user clicks the mouse to place a road.
        Parameters:
        edgeLoc - The road location

      • placeSettlement

        void placeSettlement(VertexLocation vertLoc)
        This method is called when the user clicks the mouse to place a settlement.
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - The settlement location

      • placeCity

        void placeCity(VertexLocation vertLoc)
        This method is called when the user clicks the mouse to place a city.
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - The city location

      • placeRobber

        void placeRobber(HexLocation hexLoc)
        This method is called when the user clicks the mouse to place the robber.
        Parameters:
        hexLoc - The robber location

      • startMove

        void startMove(PieceType pieceType,
               boolean isFree,
               boolean allowDisconnected)
        This method is called when the user requests to place a piece on the map (road, city, or settlement)
        Parameters:
        pieceType - The type of piece to be placed
        isFree - true if the piece should not cost the player resources, false otherwise. Set to true during initial setup and when a road building card is played.
        allowDisconnected - true if the piece can be disconnected, false otherwise. Set to true only during initial setup.

      • cancelMove

        void cancelMove()
        This method is called from the modal map overlay when the cancel button is pressed.

      • playSoldierCard

        void playSoldierCard()
        This method is called when the user plays a "soldier" development card. It should initiate robber placement.

      • playRoadBuildingCard

        void playRoadBuildingCard()
        This method is called when the user plays a "road building" progress development card. It should initiate the process of allowing the player to place two roads.

      • robPlayer

        void robPlayer(RobPlayerInfo victim)
        This method is called by the Rob View when a player to rob is selected via a button click.
        Parameters:
        victim - The player to be robbed
